original_text: They compassed me about like bees: they are quenched as the fire of thorns: for in the name of the Lord I will destroy them.
korean_text: 그들이 벌들처럼 나를 에워쌌으나 가시덤불의 불 같이 타 없어졌나니 내가 여호와의 이름으로 그들을 끊으리로다

sentences.original_text: They compassed me about like bees
they are quenched as the fire of thorns
for in the name of the Lord
